Import libraries
```{r}
library("tempoR")
library("readxl")
library("spatialEco")
```

Variable declaration
```{r}
row_labelled_expression_data_path <- '/Users/kevinkapner/Documents/Masters/Classes/Computational_Bio/Project/Code/Comp167TempoProject/Shortened_Data.xlsx'
matrix_expression_data_path <- '/Users/kevinkapner/Documents/Masters/Classes/Computational_Bio/Project/Code/Comp167TempoProject/Unlabelled_Shortened_Data.xlsx'
age_data_path <- '/Users/kevinkapner/Documents/Masters/Classes/Computational_Bio/Project/Code/Comp167TempoProject/patient_age.xlsx'
phenotype_data_path <- '/Users/kevinkapner/Documents/Masters/Classes/Computational_Bio/Project/Code/Comp167TempoProject/Disease_status.xlsx'
gene_sets_path <- '/Users/kevinkapner/Documents/Masters/Classes/Computational_Bio/Project/Code/Comp167TempoProject/GeneSets.gmt'
```

Loading in data
```{r}
row_Labelled_expression_data <- t(read_excel(row_labelled_expression_data_path))
age_data <- t(read_excel(age_data_path))
phenotype_data <- read_excel(phenotype_data_path)
gene_sets <- loadGMT(gene_sets_path)
final_data <- read_excel(matrix_expression_data_path, sheet = 1, col_name = FALSE)
```

Converting age to integer list
```{r}
ages <- as.integer(unlist(age_data[2,]))
sample_ids <- age_data[1,]
names(ages) <- sample_ids
ages <- list(ages)
```

Extracting gene names
```{r}
gene_names <- row_Labelled_expression_data[1,]
```

Correctly labelling final data
```{r}
rownames(final_data) <- sample_ids
colnames(final_data) <- gene_names
```

Grouping sample IDs by phenotype
```{r}
# 0 is for control and 1 is for parkinsons
disease_states <- as.logical(unlist(phenotype_data[,2]))
opposite_disease_states <- !disease_states
```

Combining data in information list
```{r}
Parkinsons = list()
Parkinsons$ctrl <- names(row_labelled_expression_data[opposite_disease_states,1])
Parkinsons$test <- names(row_labelled_expression_data[disease_states,1])
Parkinsons$age <- ages
```

Running Tempo
```{r}
results = tempo.run(ctrl = Parkinsons$ctrl,
                    test = Parkinsons$test,
                    genesets = gene_sets,
                    X = final_data,
                    Y = Parkinsons$age,
                    numPerms = 4,
                    nCores = 4,
                    output = "",
                    pCutoff = 1,
                    fdrCutoff = 2,
                    pMseCutoff = 1)
```
